pkgmetadata.longdescription: # compute_rhino3dPython package providing convenience functions to call compute.rhino3d.comgeometry web servicesProject Hompage: https://github.com/mcneel/compute.rhino3d### Supported platforms* This is a pure python package and should work on all versions of python## Test* start `python````>>> from rhino3dm import *>>> import compute_rhino3d.Util>>> import compute_rhino3d.Mesh>>>>>> compute_rhino3d.Util.authToken = AUTH_TOKEN_FROM (rhino3d.com/compute/login)>>> center = Point3d(250, 250, 0)>>> sphere = Sphere(center, 100)>>> brep = sphere.ToBrep()>>> meshes = compute_rhino3d.Mesh.CreateFromBrep(brep)>>> print("Computed mesh with {} faces".format(len(meshes[0].Faces))```
